title: Navaratna Pushpa Earrings - Auspicious Gemstone Studs
materials: Cat's Eye). Features small diamonds as accents.
features: Intricate floral design inspired by traditional temple jewelry motifs. The Navaratna stones are individually bezel-set and arranged in a harmonious pattern, surrounded by a delicate halo of diamonds. The gold exhibits fine filigree work and a rich Hyderabadi polish.
colors: Predominantly gold with a vibrant multi-colored gemstone palette
occasions: or as a daily wear statement piece. Suitable for Muhurtham
or other auspicious Telugu ceremonies. Also
perfect for adding a touch of tradition to modern outfits.
description: These Navaratna Pushpa Earrings bring together the auspiciousness of Navaratna gemstones with the beauty of traditional South Indian design. Each stone represents a planet and is believed to bring good luck, prosperity, and well-being to the wearer. The rich 22K gold and Hyderabadi polish add a touch of luxury, while the delicate diamond accents enhance the overall sparkle. A timeless piece that blends heritage with contemporary elegance.
